QuestData.Title: The Challenger's Ring: Yalia Sagewhisper
QuestData.Description: The Shado-Pan brothers and sisters continue to whisper of your deeds, $n.$B$BIn fact, Yalia herself has taken quite an interest in your studies.$B$BShe wishes to challenge you in the training ring.$B$BYou would do well to impress her. If you do, she just may be willing to help you in the future.
QuestData.LogDescription: Challenge Yalia Sagewhisper and defeat her in the Challenger's Ring.
